translations: n.[生物]祖先，上代；先祖（ancestor 复数形式）

phrs.translation: 祖先崇拜；祭祖；敬奉祖先

sentences.sentence: His ancestors had come to America from Ireland.
sentences.translation: 他的祖先从爱尔兰来到美国。

sentences.sentence: There was Greek blood in his veins: his ancestors originally bore the name Karajannis.
sentences.translation: 他有希腊血统——他的祖先原来姓卡拉扬尼斯。

sentences.sentence: Logic dictates that our ancestors could not have held a yearly festival until they figured what a year was.
sentences.translation: 依照逻辑推论，我们的祖先在弄清1年是什么意思之前，不可能举行过每年一度的节庆。
